form.label: SOLR Garbage Collection

input.label: Choose Alfresco Server
input.populatingSearch: | metadata type=hosts index=jmx | dedup host | table host

form.searchTemplate: index=alfresco sourcetype=alfresco_jmx_solr $host$ mbean_domain="java.lang" mbean_property_type="GarbageCollector" | eval jvmgc=jvmDescription+"_"+gcName | streamstats current=f global=f window=1 first(colCount) as next_colCount by host jvmgc | eval d_colCount=next_colCount-colCount | eval gcFreq=if(next_colCount>colCount, d_colCount, 0) | bucket _time span=1m | stats first(jvmgc) as jvmgc first(gcFreq) as gcFreq first(gcTime) as gcTime first(gcCount) as gcCount first(memPools) as memPools first(gcStart) as gcStart first(gcEnd) as gcEnd first(gcDuration) as gcDuration first(gcThreadCount) as gcThreadCount by _time host jvmDescription gcName

table.title: Garbage Collection Overview
table.searchPostProcess: | stats first(colTime) as "Collection Time (Millis)" first(colCount) as "Collection Count" first(memPools) as "Memory Pools" by host jvmDescription gcName | sort jvmDescription

chart.title: Cumulative Collection Time
chart.searchPostProcess: | chart sum(gcDuration) as "Collection Time" by jvmgc

chart.title: Cumulative Collection Count
chart.searchPostProcess: | chart sum(gcFreq) as "Collection Count" by jvmgc
